learning_objective: Use appropriate terminology in identifying and describing the function of common physical components of computing systems (hardware).
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex sets up a study schedule on their laptop, with designated study, rest, and recreational times. During the schedule, they will extensively use several programs like a word processor for typing notes, a web browser for online research, graphic editing software to design diagrams, and a video playing software to watch lecture videos. Based on this, which physical hardware component is Alex most likely running their laptop high on?",
    "Answer1": "RAM (Random Access Memory)",
    "Answer2": "Hard Drive",
    "Answer3": "Graphics Processing Unit (GPU)",
    "Answer4": "Power Supply",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "RAM (Random Access Memory) determines the amount of data a laptop can handle at a given time, especially when it's running several programs simultaneously. If Alex is running a lot of programs at the same time, they are most likely using a lot of RAM."
}
